3.text: (I look around. People are still giving their presentations.)

4.text: (I don't think time passed at all.)

9.text: (I look at the screen in front of me, displaying our game. The menu appears, just as it was in those ruins I explored.)

10.name: Sigurd
10.text: You know what? I think I did.

11.name: Teammate
11.text: Let me see! Think we can present with this?

12.text: (I look up at the concluding presentation and hear the organizer calling our group name.)
